amendment.description: To ensure that the Coast Guard has sufficient resources for its traditional core.

action.text: Amendment SA 3617 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 3617 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 38 - 50. Record Vote Number: 174.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 3617.
Amendment SA 3617 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Lautenberg. (consideration: CR S9056, S9061; text: CR S9056) To ensure that the Coast Guard has sufficient resources for its traditional core.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 3617 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 38 - 50. Record Vote Number: 174.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3617 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Lautenberg.
